response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and functionality that will exceed your expectations. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. I trust this investment will provide significant returns on your behalf. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 18000}
